content.raw:
That's a fair question. These parts could go into ServerFixture.

ServerFixture can be overwhelming to me since it has almost 2000 lines of code in its .hh and .cc files. I'm planning to add more functionality for physics accuracy tests, and this felt like a more manageable place to start putting it.
